chi_arr format

file name = 'parmeter 1 name'_'parameter 2 Name'
content = array([parameter[0],parameter[1],parameter[2],parameter[3],parameter[4],parameter[5],parameter_1_name,parameter_2_name,corresponding parameter's chi_sq value])

plot_arr format

complete array of 

file name = 'parmeter 1 name'_'parameter 2 Name'
content = [parameter 1 value, parameter 2 value, its chi sq]
